overall_style: Modern health & wellness mobile-first, friendly, motivational, blue-centric
visual_hierarchy: Card-based vertical scrolling with large hero metrics, heavy use of whitespace and breathing room

typography.font_family_primary: SF Pro Display / SF Pro Text (Apple system font), Roboto on Android

layout_structure.header: sticky with large title + right-aligned Edit button
layout_structure.main_scroll: single column, full-bleed cards with 16px horizontal padding
layout_structure.card_style: white background, 16px corner radius, subtle shadow, 20–24px internal padding
layout_structure.bottom_navigation_bar: solid blue #007AFF background, white icons + text, 83px height including safe area

header.logo: circular purple gradient with white figure
header.premium_crown: small black crown icon + PREMIUM label
header.edit_button: light blue filled pill, white text, 12px radius

hero_calorie_card.breakdown_list: icon + label + large bold number, right-aligned, colored icons (gray scale, fork/knife blue, flame orange)

metric_cards.steps_card: red shoe icon, large bold current value, muted goal below, thin progress bar with red dot handle
metric_cards.exercise_card: orange flame + checkmark, two lines with large bold values
metric_cards.weight_card: full-width background image (mountain, snow, etc.), dark overlay optional, large bold current weight

components.add_button: large white circle with bold blue '+' , floating style, subtle shadow

search_bar.style: large white pill in blue bar

components.pagination_dots: center below hero card, active blue #007AFF, inactive light gray, 8px diameter

iconography.style: custom bold filled + SF Symbols hybrid

data_visualization_style: Large bold numbers are the hero, progress rings and bars are secondary, motivational and never punitive
tone_of_voice: Encouraging, friendly, coach-like, uses celebratory icons (flame, crown, checkmark)
recommended_usage_for_ai_prompts: Use this JSON when building fitness trackers, calorie counters, health dashboards, wellness apps, or any consumer mobile app that needs a clean, friendly, Apple-inspired aesthetic with strong blue branding and large metric focus.
